short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block irrelevant channels from the home page of youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay productive while on Youtube by blocking distracting or irrelevant content from specific channels out of your homepage. You can't click on them if can't see them.
